duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct practical research in fields such as nuclear physics, radiation transport, hydrodynamics, astrophysics, and plasma dynamics.
Develop and employ high-performance scientific software for novel research tasks.
Work with mentors on assigned projects under close supervision.
Present oral presentations of each project at the end of the summer.
Present work at a poster session.

education_certification.credential: Must be currently enrolled in an accredited university and actively pursuing an undergraduate degree in Physics, Engineering, Mathematics, Computer Science or a related field.
